Module cish.compiler
Package org.alindner.cish.compiler

Class ScriptMetaInfo

java.lang.Object
org.alindner.cish.compiler.ScriptMetaInfo
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ScriptMetaInfo
extends Object
implements Serializable
represents a cish script

contains necessary meta infos like the included subscripts

Since:
0.7.0
Author:
alindner
See Also:
Serialized Form
